_header: In this Gospel is goodly graid
_description: Gospel for Saturday before Palm Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: In þis godspell es gudeli graidHow crist to his desciples said…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þe elleuyn of þis word had dredevntill it was fulfild in dede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit Iesus discipulis suis Amen amen dico uobis.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.154-157.
